title: CPD Chomel (pronounced shom-el) - fun display face
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417091155im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CPD-Chomel-DEMO_6217.jpg)

hi all,

here is CPD Chomel, a fun display face mainly intended to be used large as headings or short copy.

so far there are no caps and only limited symbols.

i look forward to hearing your thoughts.

cheers

- simon :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CPD Chomel DEMO.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417091155/http:/typophile.com/files/CPD%20Chomel%20DEMO.pdf) | 419.65 KB |
author: Sye

comments.content:
hey all,

does anyone know what category i would put this typeface in?

it's sans, but clearly quite livly compared to the likes of helvetica...

i really don't know what to call it.

- simon
I'd say it belongs in Display.
